title: Worked Solution
text:
To solve this equation using the subtraction and addition properties of equality, we can subtract $$ rac{1}{4}$$ from both sides of the equation. This gives us:
$$b= rac{3}{4}- rac{1}{4}$$
$$= rac{3-1}{4}$$
$$= rac{2}{4}$$
$$= rac{1}{2}$$
So the solution to the equation is $$b= rac{1}{2}$$.
